summary.span: 做為 物件的雜湊函式。

span.span: Serves as a hash function for a object.
A hash code for the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雜湊程式碼是用來識別物件在等號比較測試期間的數值。A hash code is a numeric value that is used to identify an object during equality testing. 它也可做為集合中物件的索引。It can also serve as an index for an object in a collection. 方法適合用於雜湊演算法和資料結構，例如雜湊表。The method is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.

summary.span: HTTP 用戶端願意接受回應的最長期限 (以秒為單位) 。

span.span: The maximum age, specified in seconds, that the HTTP client is willing to accept a response.
The time in seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性代表"max age"中的指示詞上的 HTTP 要求或 HTTP 回應的快取控制標頭欄位。This property represents the "max-age" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP request or HTTP response. 除非屬性也設定時，用戶端不願意接受的過時的回應。Unless the property is also set, the client is not willing to accept a stale response.

span.span: Whether an HTTP client is willing to accept a response that has exceeded its expiration time.

value.span: 如果 HTTP 用戶端願意接受已超過其到期時間的回應，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the HTTP client is willing to accept a response that has exceed the expiration time; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性表示，如果 「 最大過時 」 指示詞出現在 HTTP 要求的快取控制標頭欄位。This property represents if the "max-stale" directive is present in a cache-control header field on an HTTP request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property MaxStaleLimit As Nullable(Of TimeSpan)
public: property Nullable<TimeSpan> MaxStaleLimit { Nullable<TimeSpan> get(); void set(Nullable<TimeSpan> value); };
member this.MaxStaleLimit : Nullable<TimeSpan> with get, set

summary.span: 最大時間 (秒)，HTTP 用戶端願意接受超過其到期時間的回應。

span.span: The maximum time, in seconds, an HTTP client is willing to accept a response that has exceeded its expiration time.
The time in seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性代表指派給 HTTP 要求的快取控制標頭欄位中的 「 最大過時 」 指示詞的值。This property represents the value assigned to "max-stale" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP request. 如果屬性會被指派的值不是零，則用戶端是否願意接受的回應，已超過其到期時間不超過指定的秒數。If the property is assigned a value other than zero, then the client is willing to accept a response that has exceeded its expiration time by no more than the specified number of seconds. 如果為零的值指派給屬性，則用戶端是否願意接受任何年齡過時回應。If a value of zero is assigned to the property, then the client is willing to accept a stale response of any age.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property MinFresh As Nullable(Of TimeSpan)
public: property Nullable<TimeSpan> MinFresh { Nullable<TimeSpan> get(); void set(Nullable<TimeSpan> value); };
member this.MinFresh : Nullable<TimeSpan> with get, set

summary.span: HTTP 用戶端願意接受回應的有效存留期 (以秒為單位)。

span.span: The freshness lifetime, in seconds, that an HTTP client is willing to accept a response.
The time in seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性代表 HTTP 要求的快取控制標頭欄位中的"min 全新 「 指示詞。This property represents the "min-fresh" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP request. 屬性會指示 HTTP 用戶端願意接受其有效性存留期間是不小於目前時間加上以秒為單位指定時間的有效期限存留時間的回應。The property indicates that the HTTP client is willing to accept a response whose freshness lifetime is no less than its current age plus the freshness lifetime specified time in seconds. 用戶端想要將仍是全新的至少目前存在時間加上有效期限存留期的回應。The client wants a response that will still be fresh for at least the current age plus the freshness lifetime.

summary.span: HTTP 用戶端是否願意接受快取回應。

span.span: Whether an HTTP client is willing to accept a cached response.

value.span: 如果 HTTP 用戶端願意接受快取回應，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the HTTP client is willing to accept a cached response; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性表示 「 無快取 」 中的指示詞上的 HTTP 要求或 HTTP 回應的快取控制標頭欄位。This property represents the "no-cache" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP request or HTTP response. 當屬性設定為`true`出現在 HTTP 要求訊息中，應用程式應該將要求轉送到原始伺服器即使它有什麼所要求的快取的副本。When the property is set to `true` present in a HTTP request message, an application should forward the request toward the origin server even if it has a cached copy of what is being requested.

span.span: A collection of fieldnames in the "no-cache" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP response.
A collection of fieldnames.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性表示 fieldnames 必須在 「 無快取 」 中的指示詞上的 HTTP 回應的快取控制標頭欄位。This property represents fieldnames in the "no-cache" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP response.

member this.NoStore : bool with get, set

summary.span: 快取是否不得儲存 HTTP 要求訊息或任何回應的任一部分。

span.span: Whether a cache must not store any part of either the HTTP request mressage or any response.

value.span: 如果快取不得儲存 HTTP 要求訊息或任何回應的任一部分則為 ；否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性代表 「 否存放區 」 中的指示詞上的 HTTP 要求或 HTTP 回應的快取控制標頭欄位。This property represents the "no-store" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP request or HTTP response. 目的屬性是為了防止不小心版本或機密資訊的保留。The purpose of the property is to prevent the inadvertent release or retention of sensitive information. 此屬性套用至整個訊息，而且可能會傳送 HTTP 要求或回應。This property applies to the entire message, and may be sent either in an HTTP request or a response.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool NoTransform { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.NoTransform : bool with get, set

summary.span: 快取或 Proxy 是否不得變更實體主體的任一部分。

span.span: Whether a cache or proxy must not change any aspect of the entity-body.

value.span: 如果快取或 Proxy 不得變更實體主體的任一部分則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if a cache or proxy must not change any aspect of the entity-body; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性表示 否 轉換 中的指示詞上的 HTTP 要求或 HTTP 回應的快取控制標頭欄位。This property represents the "no-transform" directive in a cache-control header field on an HTTP request or HTTP response. 當設`true`，中繼快取或 rpoxies 不可以變更實體主體的任何層面。When the is set to `true`, intermediate caches or rpoxies must not change any aspect of the entity body. 中繼快取和 proxy 的實作項已經找到有用要轉換的特定實體內文的媒體類型。Implementors of intermediate caches and proxies have found it useful to convert the media type of certain entity bodies. 非 transparent proxy，例如可能的才能儲存快取空間，或減少資料傳輸至慢速連結上的影像格式之間進行轉換。A non-transparent proxy might, for example, convert between image formats in order to save cache space or to reduce the amount of traffic on a slow link. 會發生嚴重的操作問題，不過，當這些轉換會套用至實體主體適合特定種類的應用程式。Serious operational problems occur, however, when these transformations are applied to entity bodies intended for certain kinds of applications.
